Meteor.Graphics.Sprites

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • Meteor.Graphics.Bitmap
      • Meteor.Graphics.Sprites.Sprite

  • public class Sprite
extends Bitmap
    Sprite is a generic representation of a sprite class.
    This class is used as a generic representation of a sprite.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sprite(Bitmap bmp)
      The constructor used to define a sprite given a Bitmap.

      The constructor used to define a sprite given a BufferedImage.
